thread.title: MSU men's basketball starts second half of the season strong

author: @keycnewsnow
title: MSU men's basketball starts second half of the season strong
text:
MSU men’s basketball starts second half of the season strong
Published: Jan. 16, 2025 at 3:42 PM CST|Updated: 48 minutes ago
MANKATO, Minn. (KEYC) - The Minnesota State men’s basketball team is 3-1 since coming back from the holiday break.
The team put together two solid wins this past weekend defeating Bemidji State by 23 points and Minnesota Crookston by 27 points. Saturday’s win against Minnesota Crookston marked win number 499 for Coach Margenthaler, who now is one win away from reaching 500 wins.
The Mavericks are back home this weekend taking on MSU Moorhead Friday night at 5:30 and face St. Cloud State Saturday afternoon at 3:30.
